title: Buff Limestone
content:
Buff Limestone is an Item that can be passively gathered with the Mining profession by mining a Buff Limestone (skill node) with a pickaxe and a basket, requiring level 20 Mining and 1 knowledge point. One basket of limestone is awarded for each hour spent mining.

They can be purchase from Poffit's Interesting Rocks for US$4200 or sold for US$1600.
